data.name: The Great
data.detailed_description:
The Great is an open-world RPG. You are someone who live in a big city full of chaos. Crime, assault, stealing are all you'll encounter. Interacting with people is important. They will become a friend who helps you or an enemy that hurts you. But what's even more surprising when you find yourself not like everyone else. You have some special powers and secrets which you want to know.

Just like living in a big city. You can find jobs from various places or shops within the city. Jobs will let you to meet another people. Sometimes they may be need your help. If you help them, Their relationship to you will be good.

When you have a good relationship with someone, they will help you with whatever they can offer. Meanwhile If you go make them unhappy, relationship between you and them will be down, So they maybe unlike or hate you. In the worst case, they may become enemy and try to hurt you.

Criminals are merciless. when they hate you, Not only will they try to hurt you. They will also try to hurt your friend too. When your friend is dead various helps from them was there will be gone too. So your life will be more difficult.

Life is not easy, How can you survive and protect your friends when you live in this chaotic city? Only you who know the answer!!!!

data.short_description: Living in the big city with a lot of people. Somebody are friend who supports you. Somebody are not and wants to threatens you or other. Life is not easy. Criminals are not mercy. How you can survive and protect your friends with your hand and your mystery power.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Window 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel i5-2500 @2.7Ghz / AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVDIA GeForce GTX 1070 8GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 30 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Window 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel i5-9600K @3.7Ghz / AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVDIA GeForce GTX 1070 8GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 30 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible

content_descriptors.notes: The Great, is a story about Super Hero and Villain (Both Super Power and/or Human like "Thug" , "Bandit", etc). So the contents may be about crime, drug or violent action.
